title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Language Learning Strategies Using Visual Materials in Foreign Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language vocabulary and grammar comprehension (beginner level)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can generate a foreign language description of at least three sentences by explicitly analyzing visual materials (images, diagrams).
Learners can accurately identify and connect over 80% of key elements in illustrations/charts to linguistic expressions following provided visual processing guidelines.
Learners can discuss diverse interpretations of visual materials with peers, minimize language errors, and derive at least two strategies for effective communication.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
